move_first_hinge(move_vector)[source]¶
move_hinge(old_move_position, new_move_position, anchor, side, factor)[source]¶

Response move to the movement of the neighboring, leading hinge :param old_move_position: Old position of the leading hinge :param new_move_position: New position of the leading hinge :param anchor: Position of the anchor of the vector determining the new position :param side: 1 if this hinge is a next one with respect to the leading hinge,

-1 if it is the previous one

Parameters

factor – Multiplication factor determining the strength of the move

Returns
